alert.note: Alert for Brevard (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 08 at 2:31PM EDT until September 08 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL BREVARD COUNTY... At 231 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Melbourne, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Melbourne, Satellite Beach, Indialantic, Merritt Island, and West Melbourne. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
